statements: SELECT * FROM loan_transactions;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_transactions WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
SELECT id, transaction_date FROM loan_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, documentation FROM loan_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loan_transactions WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY borrower_name ASC, loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions WHERE borrower_name LIKE 'J%' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(loan_amount) AS average_loan_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM loan_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT borrower_name, MONTH(transaction_date) AS month, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM loan_transactions GROUP BY borrower_name, month ORDER BY month;
SELECT borrower_name, documentation FROM loan_transactions WHERE documentation IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(documentation) > 100 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, transaction_date FROM loans ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE document_type = 'ID Proof';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_description, upload_date FROM documentation ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE upload_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY document_type DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, transaction_date FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM documentation JOIN loans ON documentation.loan_id = loans.loan_id WHERE loans.transaction_date >= '2020-12-01' ORDER BY documentation.document_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(loan_amount), MIN(loan_amount), AVG(loan_amount) FROM loans;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_id, name, address FROM borrowers WHERE borrower_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_id, name, phone_number FROM borrowers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_documents WHERE document_type = 'Agreement';
SELECT document_id, description, document_date FROM loan_documents WHERE loan_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions WHERE borrower_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, borrower_id FROM loan_transactions WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT loan_id, description FROM loan_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' AND document_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions WHERE lender_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM borrowers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, loan_amount FROM loan_transactions WHERE is_approved = TRUE;
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, audit_date, audit_result FROM compliance_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, is_validated FROM loan_documents WHERE is_validated = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM loan_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, loan_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, loan_amount, transaction_date FROM loan_transactions WHERE is_approved=true AND loan_amount > 5000
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE email='john.doe@example.com'
SELECT * FROM loan_documents WHERE is_validated=false ORDER BY document_id ASC
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, audit_date, audit_result FROM compliance_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY audit_date
SELECT * FROM loans;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE approval_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrowers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT loan_id, document_type, document_date FROM documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM loans
SELECT borrower_name, credit_score FROM borrowers ORDER BY credit_score DESC
SELECT loan_amount, approval_date FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, loan_amount, approval_date FROM loans WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM loans l JOIN transactions t ON l.loan_id = t.loan_id WHERE transaction_amount > 5000
